amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the National Labor Relations Board to promulgate standards and a model notice for an employee to put him or herself on a list to avoid union solicitation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-26 requir es the National Labor Relations Board to promulgate standards and a model notice for an employee to put him- or herself on a `do not call or contact' list to avoid union solicitation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 256 (Roll no. 115).
